extendedInfo.description: JokeBrigade Lite In a mission to make YOU laugh!In todayâs modern world of hustle and bustle many of us, had in fact forgotten to laugh or cannot find time to have a smile! JokeBrigade Lite is a free Android app which has combined the goodness of Laughter Therapy with smartphone technology. This free version of the app will definitely put a smile on your face and help us spread the new saying, âA joke a day, keeps the Doctor awayâ!Nothing can be better than having a good laugh with your family and friends (P.S: Nothing wrong in laughing alone too). So get started now, get JokeBrigade Lite app! It has a lot to offer to you from its wide category section and clean jokes.Main Features:* Easy favourite category selection options* Child safe filters* Bookmarks* Optimised navigation and text display for ease of use* Share using Twitter, Email, Message and Bluetooth * App has been developed to work in the wide spectrum of Android versionsJokeBrigade Pro version with tons of content and fancy cool updates is on its way soon.
